page.title: 16Boscombe & Allington School
page.content: There is no school at Boscombe and Allington now. There was a school at Boscombe and Allington in the past.The school was along the{A338}main road on the{border}of Boscombe and Allington. The school has been converted to a{ {private house.}In {1894} the school was built. The school closed in {1972. The school was built of{flints, red {faced bricks, chalk}and{lime. Mr {Charlie Baugh}in {1916}and his son-in-law{Mr David Willis}atended the school. {Kevin Willis, Davids}son goes to {Idmiston School}in{1985.}The children go to {Idmiston school}on a coach now.
